name: Boulder Attack
description:
YOU PLAY AS A SKELETON, WHO HAS HAD A BAD DAY AND BOULDERS HAVE STARTED FALLING FROM THE SKY. YOU NEED TO DODGE THESE BOULDERS AND STAY ALIVE, or else.. nothing actually nothing happens its just a game.

Features in development:
  • Multiple new skins.
  • Multiple new maps.
  • Settings screen.
  • Multiple game modes.
  • Music tracks and more sound effects.
Made by: toadpen Latest Version: v1.0My Discord Server: 

https://discord.gg/KnsFUUcyu3

Please report any bugs you find in the comments or in my Discord Server. It helps me polish the game. If you want anything added to the game also comment that as well and I will consider adding it.
